mapper.select: select CEIL(count(*)/#{showLimit}) from essay where state=true

select essay.id as eassyID,userID as eassyPersonID, essay.pictureURL as eassyPicture,essayHeader as eassyHeader,country as eassyCountry,SUBSTRING(context,1,100)as eassyContent,name as eassyPersonName ,user.pictureURL as eassyPersonPicture,validate as eassyState,(select count(*) from essaycomment where essay.id=essaycomment.essayID) as eassyCommentCount from essay inner join user on user.id=essay.userID where essay.state=true order by time desc limit #{start},#{showLimit}
mapper.delete: delete from essay where id=#{essayID} and userID=#{userID}
mapper.update: update essay set eassyHeader=#{eassyHeader},context=#{context},country=#{country} where userID=#{userID} and id=#{essayID}
